content.raw:
(Reply via ste...@osrfoundation.org):

Whoops! That should be Escape, not Control. I can't make the change right
now because I'm on the train.

The request is based on feedback from three people at the kickoff, as well
as the UI standard that Escape exits fullscreen mode.
content.html:
(Reply via ste...@osrfoundation.org):

Whoops! That should be Escape, not Control. I can't make the change right now because I'm on the train.

The request is based on feedback from three people at the kickoff, as well as the UI standard that Escape exits fullscreen mode.
